source.body: Want: 5mL of DEPC/NaOAc per 1mL of IVT reaction and 1/30 NaOAc.

Prepare amplification reactions (x8) (plus 1.1x for pipette error) for each sgRNA.

source.body:
Amplification reactions of 8.8x are recommended, but the 1x Q5 PCR reaction is as follows (able to scale up or down):
1μL (10μM) Oligo 1 Primer
1μL (10μM) Oligo 2 Primer
1μL (10μM) Oligo 3 Primer
0.5μL (10mM) dNTPs
5μL Q5 Buffer
0.25μL Q5 Polymerase
16.25μL DEPC

source.description: Run some reaction mix on an agarose gel to check PCR product size.
From the 200μL PCR reactions (25μL x 8 tubes), split into 3 tubes of 66.6μL. Each tube will have a final volume of 1mL after IVT.

source.body: The PCR product doesn’t need to be cleaned before IVT.

description: This protocol explains how to transcribe gRNA in vitro.
